text: Agar aqal mand ho (to ghor kero) haan tum to enhen chahtay ho aur woh tum say mohabbat nahi rakhtay tum poori kitab ki mantay ho (woh nahi mantay phir mohabbat kaisi?) yeh tumharay samney to apney eman ka iqrar kertay hain lekin tanahi mein maaray gussay kay ungliyan chabatay hain kehdo kay apney gussay hi mein marr jao Allah Taalaa dilon kay raazon ko bakhoobi janta hai
